entry.title: How to Stake and Unstake ETH in COCA Wallet
entry.content: How to Stake and Unstake ETH in COCA Wallet porta48 1 day ago 3 min read Updated: 15 hours ago Why Staking ETH is a Smart Move Cryptocurrency isn’t just about buying and holding—it’s about making your assets work for you. Staking Ethereum (ETH) is one of the best ways to receive staking incentives while actively contributing to the security and efficiency of the Ethereum network. But the benefits go beyond just the incentives ✅ Enjoy the full scope of benefits ETH staking can provide – simply by holding and securing the network. ✅ Compound Your Rewards – Your staked ETH increases incentives through supporting the network. ✅ Support Decentralization – By staking, you play a role in validating transactions and strengthening Ethereum’s security. ✅ Reduce Market Volatility – Locked ETH reduces circulating supply, which can help stabilize market prices. ✅ Take Advantage of a Simple, Secure Process – Unlike complex yield farming strategies, staking is straightforward and lower-risk. With COCA Wallet, you can stake ETH with just a few taps, track your rewards in real time, and unstake whenever needed. Ready to put your ETH to work? Let’s dive into the step-by-step guide on how to stake ETH using COCA Wallet. How to Stake ETH in COCA: Step-by-Step Guide Staking ETH with COCA Wallet is a smooth and intuitive process. Here’s how you can do it: Step 1: Open COCA and Access Your Portfolio Launch the COCA app. Locate Ethereum (ETH) in your portfolio. If you don’t have ETH, you can easily buy or swap it within COCA. Step 2: Start Staking Tap on Ethereum in your portfolio. Find the Earn rewards section, which displays the current APY (Annual Percentage Yield) displayed. Tap "Stake" to proceed. Step 3: Agree to the Terms Read through the staking terms carefully. Check the agreement box and tap "Next" to continue. Step 4: Enter the Amount to Stake The minimum staking amount is 0.1 ETH. Your available ETH balance will be displayed. Enter the amount you wish to stake, or tap "Max" to select your full balance. *Note that a small portion of ETH must be reserved for the Ethereum network fees. Step 5: Confirm the Transaction Tap "Next" to proceed. Pay the required Ethereum network fee. Once the transaction is confirmed, your ETH will be successfully staked. You can track your staked ETH from the Asset Management section in COCA Wallet. How to Unstake ETH Need access to your staked ETH? Here’s how you can unstake it effortlessly. Step 1: Start Unstaking Tap on Ethereum (ETH) in your portfolio. Go to the "Earn" section. Tap "Unstake" to begin. Step 2: Choose the Amount to Unstake Enter the amount of ETH you wish to unstake. Tap "Enter" to proceed. Step 3: Confirm the Transaction Tap "Next" and confirm the unstaking process. Pay the required Ethereum network fee. The unstaking process will take some time before your ETH is available for withdrawal. You can monitor the unstaking status in the Currency Overview section of COCA Wallet. Final Thoughts Staking ETH in COCA Wallet is one of the simplest and safest ways to receive staking benefits while contributing to Ethereum’s security. Whether you're a long-term enthusiast or an active DeFi participant, COCA makes it easy for you to start staking with just a few taps. Ready to put your ETH to work? Start staking with COCA today!
